title: Is a Combination reaction be a redox reaction? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes of course,in fact almost all the combination reaction is a redox reaction.Redox reaction is a reaction in which there is loss or gain of electrons or there is addition or removal of oxygen or hydrogen.For eg .C+O2->CO2Here,there is addition of oxygen hence oxidation takes place.Considering other reaction,Na +Cl->NaClHere,there is loss of electron by Na and gain of electron by Chlorine.Hence,it is also a redox reaction.

Yes , combination reactioncan be redox reaction . 2Na+Cl2=2NaCl Here Na react with Cl to form NaCl .Na is reducing agent and chlorine is oxidising agent so this is combination reaction as well as Redox reaction #vivek
